title: Tool - Complete Discography in AAC - 1991-2006, better than MP3!
description:
Tool - 1991 - 72826 [Demo Tape]
Tool - 1992 - Opiate (21st Anniversary Edition) [EP]
Tool - 1993 - Prison Sex [UK Single]
Tool - 1993 - Undertow
Tool - 1994 - Sober (Tales from the Darkside) [Dutch Single]
Tool - 1996 - Ãƒâ€ nima
Tool - 1996 - Stinkfist [Promo Single]
Tool - 1997 - Forty Six & 2 [Promo Single]
Tool - 1998-07-15 - Wings Stadium, Kalamazoo, MI [Live Bootleg]
Tool - 2000 - Salival
Tool - 2001 - Lateralus
Tool - 2001 - Schism [Promo HDCD Single]
Tool - 2002 - Lateralus [Promo Single]
Tool - 2002 - Parabola [Promo Single]
Tool - 2006 - 10,000 Days
Tool - 2006 - Vicarious [Promo Single]

Originally, I did it for myself - since you won't find any Tool music available on the iTunes Store and MP3 is soooo yesterday, this solution seems logical: what I've done, I converted all albums from my own lossless collection* using Apple's AAC encoder (known as QAAC or 'iTunes Plus') with settings being very close to those they are using in the iTunes Store. With an album art attached, as a result we have a perfect solution for portable listening - smaller than MP3 320, but better quality. You are welcome!

*Here's the lossless version itself, by the way: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/11678701/
